name: Funny Easter letter - test to Bunny
name_original: Funny Easter letter - test to Bunny
description:
A cheerful test, after which you will get a lot of fun and an unforgettable impression of a letter to the Easter Rabbit!

How to play:
• Start a new game
• Answer all questions
• Read the text
• Enjoy!

You can give absolutely absurd answers to all questions. The more absurd the answer, the more fun the text!
